summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Cover Projects feature for RandomCover editor. Backend: 15/16 tests passed (94%). Frontend: All UI flows working correctly - Editor tab, Projects tab, Save/Load/Delete projects, New project creation.

minor.issue: Empty project name is accepted (returns 200 instead of 400/422 validation error)

issues: Some project cards show placeholder icon instead of preview image (may be due to missing preview_url)

passed_tests: GET /api/projects - returns list of user's projects
GET /api/projects - unauthenticated returns 401
POST /api/projects/save - create new project
POST /api/projects/save - create project with preview image
POST /api/projects/save with project_id - update existing project
POST /api/projects/save with invalid project_id - returns 404
GET /api/projects/{id} - get specific project
GET /api/projects/{id} - non-existent returns 404
GET /api/projects/{id} - unauthenticated returns 401
DELETE /api/projects/{id} - delete project
DELETE /api/projects/{id} - non-existent returns 404
DELETE /api/projects/{id} - unauthenticated returns 401
Full CRUD flow: Create -> Read -> Update -> Delete
Projects list updates after create
Frontend: Editor tab loads with canvas and controls
Frontend: Projects tab shows saved projects list
Frontend: Save Project button opens dialog
Frontend: Save dialog accepts project name and saves
Frontend: Project cards display with preview and timestamp
Frontend: Click on project card loads project into editor
Frontend: New Project button creates empty project
Frontend: Dropdown menu shows Open and Delete options
Frontend: Toast notifications for save/load/delete actions
action_items: Consider adding validation for empty project_name in POST /api/projects/save endpoint
critical_code_review_comments: Backend CoverProjectSave model should add min_length=1 validation to project_name field
Frontend RandomCover.jsx has eslint warnings about missing useEffect dependencies (saveProject, handleUndo, handleRedo, deleteSelectedText) - not critical but should be addressed
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_UI_Project_* during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Cover Projects feature fully tested and working. API endpoints: GET /api/projects, POST /api/projects/save, GET /api/projects/{id}, DELETE /api/projects/{id}. Frontend has Editor and Projects tabs on /random-cover page. All CRUD operations work correctly. Minor issue: empty project name validation missing on backend.
